lead_paragraph: HORBAR--Stanley. December 23, 1919 - July 14, 2016. Devoted loving husband, father, and grandfather. Born in Brooklyn, attended NYU, and honored with the Air Medal and Bronze Star for his service in WWII as an Army Captain. He was president of Dearborn Manufacturing, Etz Chaim Synagogue, and Middlebay and Boca Greens Country Clubs. He retired to Florida where he spent many happy years with his beloved wife, Rita. He was Rita's "Mr. Wonderful" and the patriarch of an adoring family. He leaves an indelible mark on the hearts of all who knew and loved him. 1/3
